Text: Bigg Boss 2 was the 2008 second season of the Indian reality TV programme "Bigg Boss".

Text: Bigg Boss 2:  Fourteen handpicked housemates entered during the launch and were described "newsmakers" rather than celebrities, though the majority of the contestants were associated with Bollywood or Indian TV channels and other realities shows.
